title: Cutting oils and fluids
creator_credit: Lawrence Crabb, Michael Barden and R.H.R. Productions
brief_description: The composition and qualities of the various types of water-based fluids and neat cutting oils; their function, the importance of selecting the right one for the job, and the benefits derived from good housekeeping and hygiene.
creator_credit_for_label: Lawrence Crabb, Michael Barden and R.H.R. Productions
description: The composition and qualities of the various types of water-based fluids and neat cutting oils; their function, the importance of selecting the right one for the job, and the benefits derived from good housekeeping and hygiene.
